nodes.text: The E-Web (15) was a heavy repeating blaster manufactured by BlasTech Industries. It was equipped with an automatic deflector shield generator and a Gk7 Cryocooler, which made it more efficient than the F-Web repeating blaster. The repeating blaster could fire for up to an hour at a sufficient range to discourage most armies.

The E-Web (15) was first mentioned in Star Wars Legends as the E-Web(15) Heavy Repeating Blaster in The Last Command Sourcebook, a hardcover supplement for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, released in March 1994. The E-Web (15) was first mentioned in the new Star Wars Canon in Blasters and Firearms, a reference book published exclusively in France by Altaya on February 23, 2021.
